titleStmt.title: A loyall song of the royall feast, kept by the prisoners in the Towre in August last, with the names, titles and characters of every prisoner. By Sir F.W. knight and baronet, prisoner.
titleStmt.author: Wortley, Francis, Sir, 1591-1652.

notesStmt.note: Sir F.W. knight and baronet = Sir Francis Wortley.
Verse - "God save the best of Kings, King Charles,".
Reproduction of the original in the British Library.
